src:
Kako varno domov z žura, kjer ni javnih prevozov
06 Nov 2019, 06:03 by Marica Uršič Zupan

Najpogostejši vzrok smrti mladih med 15. in 24. letom starosti so prometne nesreče. Številke so v zadnjem desetletju ali dveh manj tragične kot desetletja prej, a še vedno zelo zaskrbljujoče in za družine, ki izgubijo mlado življenje, izjemno boleče. Lani so ceste ugasnile 17 mladih življenj, letos ...



50 sežanskim dijakom, ki so aktivno sodelovali v akciji Heroji furajo v pižamah, so svoje izkušnje iz prometnih nesreč predstavili tudi ambasadorji zavoda Vozim.  Foto: Marica Uršič Zupan

SEŽANA > “Večina nesreč, v katerih so udeleženi mladi, se zgodi ob koncu tedna in na poti na ali z zabave,” je Vesna Marinko, v. d. direktorice ...

How to safely get home from a party with no public transportation
06 Nov 2019, 06:03 by Marica Ursic Zupan

The most common cause of death for young people between the ages of 15 and 24 is road accidents. The numbers are less tragic in the last decade or two than decades, but still very worrying and extremely painful for families who lose their young lives. Last year, the roads extinguished 17 young lives, this year ...



The 50 ambassadors of Sežana, who actively participated in the action Heroes Fur in Pajamas, also presented their experiences in traffic accidents to the ambassadors of the Vozim Institute. Photo: Marica Ursic Zupan

SEZANA> "Most accidents involving young people happen on the weekends and on the way to or from a party," said Vesna Marinko, v. d. Director ...
